author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing incompatible change made to XSConstants for XML Schema 1.1 support.

author: mrglavas
msg: The error message for maxNodeOccurs limit was misleading in
that it related the limit to the maxOccurs attribute in the
schema. It really is a limit on the number of nodes which may
be created for representing the content model of a given type.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a bug from a previous commit.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding org.w3c.dom.xpath to the API page.
